author: Ted Fishman
comment: I love the app with a couple of suggestions.  First,  the volume adjustment could stand to have more fine adjustment if possible.  Seems like changes are a bit too abrupt. Secondly,  if you could increase the transparency or do something to keep the notification from substantially blocking the clock.  I listen to podcasts for many hours and I'd rather be able to see the clock.
title: Transparency

author: Björn Lundén
comment: I like the app as it seems to do what it's supposed to and the controls are good. I'm not sure I like the grey background though. I'd rather have a more clean version without that background or with a solid color. The current image just ends up looking low-res and a bit boring.
title: Works great. Could be even cleaner though.

author: Fábio Nunes
comment: On my LG R, it does not remember the volume position i set. So every time i open the app on my watch it shows like it's muted, even though it's playing loudly. Also the volume button could be easier to use, cause when it's at minimum i often end up closing the app (by swiping) then changing the volume.
title: Good but not perfect

author: Dustin Bowman
comment: Sure needs a little improvement but actually works better than any other volume control app for my Nexus 5/ Moto 360.
title: Not the top app?

author: Mike Parks
comment: I'm looking for a volume control for my Onkyo app.  This doesn't work.
title: Bummer

author: Nate Ioriatti
comment: Works great, I just wish the UI picked up some material design cues. To me, it looks a bit dated. But hey, it is very functional.

reply.author: Varun Kochar
reply.content:
Hi Nate,
Thank you for the feedback. Will push an update in the coming weeks. If you have any other feedback please send me an email. Cheers!

title: Works great

author: Jimmy Don
comment: 8 out of 10 times app won't work.
title: Doesn't always work.

author: Devon Reid
comment: It's good but how do you get rid of the card?  On my Sony smartwatch 3.
title: Pretty Good

author: Chris Belcher
comment: Didn't work on my Samsung S4 with Sony smart watch 3
title: Didn't work.

author: Frank Tedesco
comment: Nexus 5
title: Doesn't do anything

author: Sivakumar Sankaran
comment: Always expected something like this to be on your side.
title: Works like a charm!

author: Ronald Collins
comment: Whatever
title: Trenton

author: Sergio Rincon
comment: Great useful app at the office.

author: Vinodkumar Ram
comment: Very nice

author: Pramath Malik
comment: It's hard to get out of the volume control without changing the volume. I always end up reducing it
title: It's OK

author: George Sol
comment: Works well, no audible lag when adjusting volume, great job!
title: Moto 360

author: Alan Kemsley
comment: Also, would be better if the notification card on the watch simply read "Volume" instead of "Adjust Volume" since the latter is too long and gets cut off.
title: Easy to accidentally change the volume when swiping back

author: Ken Ah Lo
comment: Hey great work. Really thanks for the updates on this. Your volume control solution is the only one worth having installed.  Have you considered allowing us to change the background graphic?

reply.author: Varun Kochar
reply.content: Hey Ken, Seems to be a good idea to let users customize the background and also the colors of the circular volume controller. Please email me your feedback and more ideas and I will work on them. Thanks Again Ken!

title: Thank you.

author: Nicolas Ortiz
comment: Quick way to access the volume of my music
title: Nice!

author: 99nights S
comment: Kept muting my phone - while watching videos and listening to music. And just leaving my phone idle and coming back to see it muted. This is the reason why I give it 1 star otherwise I'd give it 5. Please fix bug.
title: Worked but game breaking bug

author: Adam Doyle
comment: Doesn't open automatically when playing Pandora.

reply.author: Varun Kochar
reply.content:
Hi Adam,
Could you please try the "Reset" option in the app to see if you are able to receive the notification on your watch. Or please email me via the feedback option in the app. Thanks!

title: Have to manually open

author: Gary Shih
comment: Useful all but notifications card is not persistent.  Also volume control easily missed and end up dismiss the card
title: Useful

author: Robert Lewis
comment: Works well, only needed one Start/Reset to get going!
title: Liking it

author: Michael Castillo
comment: Tried the others and this should be at the top.  No extra  permissions
title: Great app

author: Jared Ybarra
comment: Noise
title: Loud
